typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as integer,
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as double,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as integer,
		modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Employees
source(output(
		max_emp_key as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(emp_key) max_emp_key from [dbo].[dimemp]',
	format: 'query') ~> dimempmaxkey
source(output(
		EMP_KEY as integer,
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as integer,
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as decimal(7,2),
		COMM as decimal(7,2),
		DEPTNO as integer,
		FromDate as timestamp,
		ToDate as timestamp,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dimemp
Employees select(mapColumn(
		src_EMPNO = EMPNO,
		src_ENAME = ENAME,
		src_JOB = JOB,
		src_MGR = MGR,
		src_HIREDATE = HIREDATE,
		src_SAL = SAL,
		src_COMM = COMM,
		src_DEPTNO = DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, dimempmaxkey join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> crossjoin
crossjoin, dimempselect join(src_EMPNO == dimEMPNO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split(src_EMPNO==dimEMPNO,
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(match, unmatch)
dimemp select(mapColumn(
		dimEMP_KEY = EMP_KEY,
		dimEMPNO = EMPNO,
		dimJOB = JOB
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimempselect
split1@match alterRow(updateIf(dimEMP_KEY<=max_emp_key)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 derive(DerTodate = currentTimestamp(),
		DerIsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
split1@unmatch sink(input(
		EMP_KEY as integer,
		EMPNO as decimal(4,0),
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as decimal(4,0),
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as decimal(7,2),
		COMM as decimal(7,2),
		DEPTNO as decimal(2,0),
		FromDate as timestamp,
		ToDate as timestamp,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EMPNO = src_EMPNO,
		ENAME = src_ENAME,
		JOB = src_JOB,
		MGR = src_MGR,
		HIREDATE = src_HIREDATE,
		SAL = src_SAL,
		COMM = src_COMM,
		DEPTNO = src_DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
split1@match sink(input(
		EMP_KEY as integer,
		EMPNO as decimal(4,0),
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as decimal(4,0),
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as decimal(7,2),
		COMM as decimal(7,2),
		DEPTNO as decimal(2,0),
		FromDate as timestamp,
		ToDate as timestamp,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EMPNO = src_EMPNO,
		ENAME = src_ENAME,
		JOB = src_JOB,
		MGR = src_MGR,
		HIREDATE = src_HIREDATE,
		SAL = src_SAL,
		COMM = src_COMM,
		DEPTNO = src_DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		EMP_KEY as integer,
		EMPNO as decimal(4,0),
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as decimal(4,0),
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as decimal(7,2),
		COMM as decimal(7,2),
		DEPTNO as decimal(2,0),
		FromDate as timestamp,
		ToDate as timestamp,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EMPNO'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EMPNO = src_EMPNO,
		ToDate = DerTodate,
		isActive = DerIsActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
